name: Retaliate
description: You rush to avenge a fallen ally. When a creature causes an ally to faint, you may move up to your speed to immediately rush forward and make a melee attack roll on the target, dealing 1d12 + MOVE normal damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Affected by how well the previous Pokemonâ€™s move went.
